Author: unfortunatelyim
Text: thankyou ‚ù§ I think I just needed a vent tbh. the detriment of commenting on peoples bodies I think is only something people understand when they've been thru the wringer themselves

Author: PsychadelicSpaceCat
Text: > I NEVER comment on other peoples bodies, EVER, bc i DONT KNOW what kind of place they are in mentally, I just feel like it's so fucking out of place to comment on a STRANGERS BODY, in any form  This is a golden rule I wish everyone in the world would follow üòü It's so hard and I'm sorry you've been pestered by people talking about your body while you're struggling. I hate those comments too. They really suck. It's none of their business and it literally serves zero function but people are dumb. Don't have much support I can give, just that I'm sorry and I hope things get easier soon ‚ù§Ô∏è
